enabling_node_inclusion: Kugonesa node inclusion mode, ndapota mira...
enabling_node_exclusion: Kugonesa node yekubvisa modhi, ndapota mira...
inclusion_message: Dzvanya bhatani pane mudziyo waunoda kuwedzera kune iyi network.
exclusion_message: Dzvanya bhatani pamudziyo waunoda kubvisa kubva kune iyi network.
task_duration_notice: Basa iri rinogona kutora kusvika {{timeout}} kwemasekonzi kuti ripere.
association_description: Midziyo iyi inotumira mishumo kumanodhi anosanganisirwa mumapoka emubatanidzwa. Kuti ugamuchire mishumo kubva kumudziyo uyu, sanganisira node 1 (mutongi) mumapoka emubatanidzwa.
generic_parameter_description: Pinda configuration parameter nhamba uye kukosha kwekuseta.
